Straight Shot watches Elita and puts a gentile paw on her shoulder.

" Don'=
t worry, it'll be okay.  We're coming close to the Ark now."

Rattrap meets=
 them outside the Ark.

" Whew, ya came back with the kid... Hello, who's t=
he spiny one in your cab?"

Straight Shot waddles out of Nightshift and sit=
s up to look to Rattrap.

" It's me, Straight Shot.  I sort of had a little=
 form change."

Rattrap grins.

" Not baaaad, I like it.  Ooooh do those qu=
ills launch out or just fall out?"

Straight Shot ponders the question.

" =
Good question."

Perpetually on the move and constantly busy.
